Introduction
This topic contains information on determining presumptive SC, including
overview of presumptive SC
considering presumptive SC
for metastatic cancer
, and
under historical rating criteria
burden of proof required to rebut presumptive SC
example of
sufficient evidence to rebut presumptive SC
, and
insufficient evidence to rebut presumptive SC
, and
establishing onset during a required manifestation period
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Presumptive Service Connection (SC)
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
